original_text:
and that to you, O Lord, belongs steadfast love.
For you will render to a man
    according to his work.
korean_text: 주여 인자함은 주께 속하오니 주께서 각 사람이 행한 대로 갚으심이니이다

sentences.original_text: and that to you, O Lord, belongs steadfast love.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 여호와여, 인자하신 것이 주께 속하였사오니

sentences.original_text: For you will render to a man
